title: What's the song How Long by Charlie Puth about? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is about his relationship with Bella Thorne in which she was also dating Tyler Posey without him knowing. And in the song he sings as though he is the one dating more than one person It is sort of a follow up on Attention but he didn't want it to be the same so it has a slightly different beat and tune
About a man telling his girlfriend about an affair he is having/had with another woman. This website is great specifically for wondering about song lyrics: Charlie Puth – How Long
